column4: er, is that ubuntu related?  anyway, my guess is read the motherboard manual
well, I dunno, I only noticed it in ubuntu ;) Guess that would be a good place to start. I'm at work, and just thought there might be some util or othe rway of inferring
oh i see. where are you getting these tsz* values from?  bios?
The gnome temperature applet reported them. I noticed it last night. I'm gonna check the bios and the manual when I get home.
google results tell me that while tszv may seem like a video card temp sensor, naming conventions don't always reveal their true place in the comp
